Text: Finally! *Phew* Viva El Rushbo and jwhitt! :)
Im not a fan of Mark Steyn. I guess the guys from Canada and Britain like him but I like Rush and then Hannity. Savage just gets a lil old with the yelling.
thanks from a conservative in Germany!

Savage is probably still whining about the whole "Banned in Britain" thing.  I definitely think it is bullshit the way he was lumped in with terrorists and other scum and their reasons for not letting him in were pretty weak.

I caught a little bit of one of his shows about a month ago and he was still going on about it and pushing his book.  The way he responded really didn't endear me to his cause.

However, it is sad how the British politicians will allow Islamists who openly call for the death of their Prime Minister and other violence but deny entry to Savage.

It is also pathetic how the media overlooks the thugs, racist bigots and segregationists of groups like the Black Panthers but get all twisted up over guys like Savage.


Thanks to the uploader.

Thanks JW.

Welcome Johannes.

Savage has his place, but I have never been able to listen to him for more than about 10 minutes.
Fingernails on the chalkboard kind of thing.

Though I don't think he's the best host, my money's on Levin for the smartest.  I disagree with Rush on some issues but I find Rush to be the best host.  I'd also rate Boortz as the last one I'd want to get into an argument with.

I am sure if everyone that posts here were to list their favs and why we like them, it would vary quite a bit.

On the other side, I'd have to say out of the liberal talkshow hosts I have tried to listen to, Randi Rhodes is the one best at making my ears bleed.
Wow, there are conservatives in Germany? Why don't the three of you get together and form a club or something.

Thanks for the Rush.  I would at this time like to apologize to our American brethren for the Speech Nazis here in Canada who tried to intimidate Ann Coulter at the U of Ottawa.  The political correctness in the West is truly over the top.
@thunderbum - No sweat man, we all have days like that.  Have a great and hopefully long weekend my friend.
